properties.comment: DDL statements for user database using GeoStore Database
properties.entry: CREATE TABLE gs_user ( id bigint NOT NULL, name character varying(20) NOT NULL, user_password character varying(255), user_role character varying(255) NOT NULL )
CREATE INDEX idx_user_attribute_name ON gs_user_attribute USING btree (name)
CREATE INDEX idx_user_attribute_text ON gs_user_attribute USING btree (string)
